samaja parihaniyata mulika hethuwa math uwadurayinaduhaba jayagannapirithe balayaanagarika dharmapalathumama-ge igenaganimasulugulu upasakasiyawasak sapirena witharandeniya shri sudarshanaramayawanasi yana bauddha urumaya thambailipola purana wiharayabharathaye therawada budu dahame awasana balakotuwaajan brahmawanso maha therun wahanselowa handunaganimata apahasu ekama saththwayanawa arahadi budu guna bhawanawasorun pansiya denage kathawa:dharma sangayanawa wachanayata sima weladharma sakachchathalangama shri dhammananda daham pasalawiyath siyapatha.po.sa sa/pela buddha dharma padam malawadhammapada paliyawajira himiyanta aggamaha panditha upadhiyadewdath theralama gi saha kawibuduhamuduruwo upama ha kathandara kimehi athi dakshayekimaha siwa therun wahansesarala bhawana karmasthana wigrahayak...lowada sangarawaminisun naraka wada karanne ayi?kath ekkada jiwath wenne?bhawa sanna sahitha buddha nithi sangrahayakopaya palanaya karaganna bari wu witabauddha githayamata mehema wune ayi ?raja manduraka upan rohini kumariyatath kala kam pala deek pohoyaka silsamadan wu uththama sthawiriyage kathawapinlokaya palanaya karanawa wenuwata anuwarthanaya wennanayiwala shri dhammarathana bauddha madhyasthanayawipassi budun wahansege kalayehi bandhumathi nagarayehi rajathuma pohoyak pasama sil samadan wemin weherata gos dan demin bana asamin kal yawayi.

numbaa athishayinma lakshanawi, rajyayak wena hatiyata wardhanayawuwehiya. 14 numbae shobhanakama nisa numbae kirthiya jathin athare pathiragiyeya; maknisada ma wisin numbaa kerehi thabu mage thejasa nisa eeka sampurnawa thibuneyayi swamiwu dewiyanwahanse kiyanaseka 15 numuth numbae shobhanakama kere numbaa wishwasakota, numbae kirthiya nisa weshyakamkaramin, langin yana ekinekatama numbae weshyakam wagirewuwehiya; eya ohuta wuneya. 16 numbae wasthrawalin samaharak numbaa ragena, wisithuru warnawath us than sadagena, palamu siduwunewath mathu siduwannewath nathi aakarayakata eewa uda weshyakamkelehiya. 17 ma numbaata dunnawu mage ran ridiwalin sadu numbae lakshana aabharana ragena purushayange rupa sadagena, eewa samanga weshyakamkelehiya; 18 numbae wisithuru wasthrawalin numbaa eewa wasa, mage thelda mage sugandha drawyayada eewa idiriyehi thabuwehiya. 19 kanta ma wisin numbaata dunnawu mage kama wana sihin pitida thelda mipanida numbaa mihiri suwanda pinisa eewa idiriyehi thabuwehiya, mese wunayayi swamiwu dewiyanwahanse kiyanaseka. 20 thawada ma nisa numbaa wadu numbae puthrayanda numbae duwarunda numbaa ragena winashawimata owun eewata pujakelehiya. 21 numbaa mage daruwan ginnata kapakota owun eewata maradunne numbae weshyakam sulu karanayakwu nisada? 22 numbae siyalu pilikulkamwaladida weshyakamwaladida numbaa nirwasthrawa, nagnawa, numbae lewala wathira unnawu numbae bala kalaya numbaa sihi nokelehiya. 23 thawada numbaata dukwe!

anek guruwara guruwariyan siyalu denama pasalata aaha.guru mandalaye siti perera guruthumiya pasal enne thani gona bandi tantu karaththayakini.me athara guru mandalaye siti jayasinha ha jayamanna yana gurun dedena sthanochitha pa‡∑äragnyawen yuktha ‚Äúkokatath ottu‚Äù guruwaru dedenak wuha.pasal waththa shuddha pawitha‡∑ära kirime katayuthuwala yedi sitina atharathura jayasinha ha jayamanna yana guruwaru dedena pasal waththe athi usa nathi pol gas hatharakata badaga in pol kaduha.gas hatharakin pol gedi panahak pamana kadu owuhu perera guruthumiyage thani gona bandi tantu karaththaye bakkiyata pol gedi panaha damagena kattimahana handiye athi kadayakata eya wikinima sandaha karaththaya dakkagena giye saram andagena angata kamisayakwath nomathiwaya.gurun dedena angata kamisayakwath nomathiwa karaththaya dakka gena yana ayuru pasale anekuth guruwarunata mahath aaswadajanaka dasunak wiya.
